ARTICLE.TITLE: Lennar targets first-time buyers in NuHome community in Porter
ARTICLE.TEXT:
Lennar targets first-time buyers in NuHome community in Porter

NuHome, a division of Lennar Corp., will offer six floor plans with three- and four-bedroom layouts in Porter's Country Colony neighborhood northeast of Houston. NuHome, a division of Lennar Corp., will offer six floor plans with three- and four-bedroom layouts in Porter's Country Colony neighborhood northeast of Houston. Photo: Lennar Photo: Lennar Image 1 of / 3 Caption Close Lennar targets first-time buyers in NuHome community in Porter 1 / 3 Back to Gallery

Lennar opened its second NuHome community of entry-level homes in the Houston area in Porter. The company plans to build more than 90 homes in the Country Colony community, located east of U.S. 59 off Ricewood Drive and North Lake Houston Drive.

Prices in Country Colony start in the $170,000s. The one and two-story homes range from 1,174 to 2,229 square feet.

RELATED: Listen: A home for every income

Wayside Village, the builder's first area NuHome community on Wayside Drive near Little York, is nearly sold out.

“NuHome connects with a growing, under-served market of home buyers,” John Hammond, Houston division president of Lennar said in an announcement.

Country Colony will hold a grand opening on Saturday, Feb. 15 at 5803 Rosehill Forest Lane. Lennar NuHome's in-house Eagle Home Mortgage will be on hand.
